verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Should a wise <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H6030>utter<s%> <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>?
Should he <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H5532>unprofitable<s%> <S%H1697>talk<s%>? or with <S%H4405>speeches<s%> with which he can do no <S%H3276>good<s%>?
<S%H6565>Yes<s%>, you cast off <S%H3374>fear<s%>, and <S%H1639>restrain<s%> <S%H7881>prayer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.
For your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H502>utters<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and you <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty<s%>.
Your own <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7561>condemns<s%> <S%H8193>you<s%>, and not I: Yes, your own lips testify against <S%H6030>you<s%>.
Are you the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that was <S%H3205>born<s%>? or were you <S%H2342>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%>?
Have you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5475>secret<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%>? and do you <S%H1639>restrain<s%> wisdom to <S%H2451>yourself<s%>?
What <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>you<s%>, that we know <S%H995>not<s%>? what understand you, which is not in us?
With us are both the <S%H7867>grayheaded<s%> and very <S%H3453>aged<s%> <S%H3524>men<s%>, much <S%H3117>older<s%> than your <S%H1>father<s%>.
Are the <S%H8575>consolations<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H4592>small<s%> with <S%H328>you<s%>? is there any secret thing with <S%H1697>you<s%>?
Why does your <S%H3820>heart<s%> carry you <S%H3947>away<s%>? and what do your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> wink <S%H7335>at<s%>,
That you <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> against <S%H410>God<s%>, and lettest such <S%H4405>words<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?
What is <S%H582>man<s%>, that he should be <S%H2135>clean<s%>? and he which is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that he should be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>?
<S%H539>Behold<s%>, he puts no trust in his <S%H6918>saints<s%>; <S%H8064>Yes<s%>, the heavens are not <S%H2141>clean<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
How much more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> and <S%H444>filthy<s%> is <S%H376>man<s%>, which <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>?
I will <S%H2331>show<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, hear <S%H2372>me<s%>; and that which I have seen I will <S%H5608>declare<s%>;
Which <S%H2450>wise<s%> men have <S%H5046>told<s%> from their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and have not hid <S%H3582>it<s%>:
Unto whom alone the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%>, and no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H2342>travails<s%> with pain all his <S%H3117>days<s%>, and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> is <S%H6845>hidden<s%> to the <S%H6184>oppressor<s%>.
A <S%H6343>dreadful<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> is in his <S%H241>ears<s%>: in <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>him<s%>.
He <S%H539>believes<s%> not that he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and he is <S%H6822>waited<s%> for of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
He wanders <S%H5074>abroad<s%> for <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H3045>saying<s%>, Where is it? he knows that the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
<S%H6862>Trouble<s%> and <S%H4691>anguish<s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%>; they shall <S%H8630>prevail<s%> against <S%H4428>him<s%>, as a king <S%H6264>ready<s%> to the <S%H3593>battle<s%>.
For he stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H410>God<s%>, and <S%H1396>strengthens<s%> himself against the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>.
He <S%H7323>runs<s%> upon <S%H6677>him<s%>, even on his neck, upon the <S%H5672>thick<s%> <S%H1354>bosses<s%> of his <S%H4043>bucklers<s%>:
Because he <S%H3680>covers<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> with his <S%H2459>fatness<s%>, and <S%H6213>makes<s%> collops of <S%H6371>fat<s%> on his <S%H3689>flanks<s%>.
And he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H3582>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and in <S%H1004>houses<s%> which no man <S%H3427>inhabits<s%>, which are <S%H6257>ready<s%> to become <S%H1530>heaps<s%>.
He shall not be <S%H6238>rich<s%>, neither shall his <S%H2428>substance<s%> <S%H6965>continue<s%>, neither shall he <S%H5186>prolong<s%> the <S%H4512>perfection<s%> there upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

He shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; the <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up<s%> his <S%H3127>branches<s%>, and by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall he go <S%H5493>away<s%>.
Let not him that is <S%H8582>deceived<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> in <S%H7723>vanity<s%>: for <S%H7723>vanity<s%> shall be his <S%H8545>recompence<s%>.
It shall be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> his <S%H3117>time<s%>, and his <S%H3712>branch<s%> shall not be <S%H7488>green<s%>.
He shall shake <S%H2554>off<s%> his unripe <S%H1154>grape<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and shall cast <S%H7993>off<s%> his <S%H5328>flower<s%> as the <S%H2132>olive<s%>.
For the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H2611>hypocrites<s%> shall be <S%H1565>desolate<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H7810>bribery<s%>.
They <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%>, and bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>vanity<s%>, and their <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H3559>prepares<s%> <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
